attributes.action: Grant home educators the right to sit exams in local schools as independent students
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Home educators find it very difficult to find places fortheir children to sit exams.  They should have the right to enter their child at a local school for the purpose of sitting an exam as an independent student.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Grant home educators the right to sit exams in local schools as independent students."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11996.asp
